DOC.brief_summary: A study to compare the safety and effectiveness of 5 different ways of taking Pulmicort when given to asthma patients aged 12 years and above.
DOC.brief_title: Adults With Moderate to Severe Asthma
DOC.criteria: Male or female aged 12 or over who have asthma Ability to properly use an electronic diary Able and willing to nebulize for up to 20 minutes every morning and evening Hospitalised at least one once or required emergency treatment due to asthma in the previous 6 months Planned hospitalisation during the study pregnant women or women planning to become pregnant
